page.title: 16CANCER CONCERN PAGE 16
page.content: THE LEVEL OF CANCER DEATH IS MUCH HIGHER HERE THAN IN OTHER RURAL AREAS IN N.IRELAND.IT IS THOUGHT THAT THE IRISH SEA HAS BEEN POLLUTATED BY NUCLEAR WASTE FROM SELLAFIELD.IT IS THOUGHT THAT BATHING IN THIS AREA CAN RESULT IN CANCER.THERE WAS AN INCIDENT WHEN SOME GIRLS BATHED TOGETHER IN THE IRISH SEA.LATER MOST OF THEM HAD DEFORMED BABIES.MANY FISH CAUGHT IN THE IRISH SEA ARE DISTORTED.THIS DISTORTION IS NOT APPARENT IN OTHER FISHING AREAS.A DELEGATION OF LOCAL COUNCILLORS RECENTLY VISITED THE SELLAFIELD NUCLEAR PLANT.A GOVERNMENT INQUIRY RESULTED AND AN INVESTIGATION AND A DETAILED ARE BEING CARRIED OUT. THIS WILL HOPEFULLY SHOW THE NUMBER OF DEATHS CAUSED BY CANCER AND IT IS HOPED THAT THE TESTS WILL SHOW THE CAUSE OF CANCER.
